about_the_game:
Get a head start on your journey with the Season3 First Steps Pack!

Designed for all new adventurers, this pack provides essential starter items to support you as you dive into the season’s challenges and rewards.

Contents
- 3 of Premium Buff Set (7 days)
- Premium Point 1000p

■ Notices

- This DLC contains consumable items and is non-refundable.

- Each account can only purchase each DLC once.

- DLC contents will be maintained during season3 (about 10 months)
  * Season 3 started on Dec 24, 2024

- DLC contents are subject to change after prior notice.

name: DK ONLINE - SEASON3 FIRST STEPS PACK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Duel core 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: *DLC contains consumable items, so we disabled refunds on this DLC.
